questions.text: How do I handle it when you're busy or distracted?
choices: I understand and give you space
I try to help so we can connect sooner

questions.text: What's my attachment style when stressed?
choices: I seek more closeness and reassurance
I oscillate between seeking and withdrawing

questions.text: How do I prefer to maintain our connection when life gets busy?
choices: Quality over quantity - focused time together
Physical presence even if we're doing separate things

questions.text: What do I need to feel valued when you have other commitments?
choices: Being included in your plans when possible
Understanding why other things need attention
Making up for it with quality time later

questions.text: How do I show I'm secure in our relationship?
choices: I give you space without anxiety
I trust you without needing constant reassurance
